data.title: Can't connect to Pervasive 64-bit ODBC source · Issue #5615 · dbeaver/dbeaver
data.meta_description: I'm having an issue identical to that reported in #522 . This is especially an issue now that you've discontinued the 32-bit version of DBeaver. 32-bit DBeaver works with a 32-bit ODBC connection. 64-bit DBeaver refuses to work with 64-b...
